alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Madison, southern Lanier and central Lowndes Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lakeland to near Madison. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Madison, Lake Park, Lakeland, Valdosta, Moody Air Force Base, Dasher, Lee, Naylor, Courthouse, Greenwood, Twin Lakes, Cherry Lake, Pinetta, Hansell, Valdosta Regional Airport, I-75 At Exit 5, Clyattville, Hanson, I-75 At Exit 11 and Stockton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
